author: markt
msg: Prevent user passwords appearing in log files if a runtime exception (e.g. OOME) occurs while creating a new user for a MemoryUserDatabase via JMX.

author: jorton
msg: Fix load order dependencies in LDAP code by switching to use of APR
optional functions for the inter-module API:
include/ap_ldap_rebind.h: ... here.  All declarations changed to APR

author: ltheussl
msg: Document to run site lifecycle phase before staging. site:stage does not execute any phase, so it does not necessarily generate the whole site. Additionally, since site-plugin-2.3 and 3.0-beta-4, the site has to be generated before (stage-)deploy.

author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-4069: Removed out of memory test as it would depend on avail memory on servers etc. And its using SoftReference from the JDK which works.
